description: Primes whose sum of digits is 8.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..500
example: 1151 is a prime with sum of digits =8, hence belongs to the sequence.
prog: (MAGMA) [p: p in PrimesUpTo(20000) | &+Intseq(p) eq 8]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 08 2014
crossrefs: Cf. similar sequences listed in A244918.
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Jun 21 2001
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Jul 06 2001
